name: MineLots
short_description: This game is currently under-development and it is a game like minecraft. The only different is that, MineLots has lots of blocks and Dimensions(Not Planed Yet) and others. Minecraft has mods, maps, texture packs, NEEDS TO PAY, and more.
summary: A world full of creativity, imaginations and creations!
